text:
Hello can someone help me I have installed Fill CRM app / Fill esignatures. I have 4 accounts in total

Two of the accounts are working fine and can create document however two accounts are getting an error

I dont have any experience with this Fill CRM App, however I have developed multiple apps that use the crm card feature -> Most likely the integration is sending "bad data, like a value of null" which ends up with such an error description.
While you cannot directly change the code, you could try to compare the difference between the two accounts where it works vs the ones where it does not work.

It could be that a property value is not set on the ones that are showing the error.
maybe I should reach out to the developer of the app?
Thats the alternative. But you might be able to figure this out by comparing the properties on that account to see where its going wrong.
They have same properties and permission
Ok, then lets hope they can react to your request quickly :pray:

Hello, I need help. I have a static UL list created in HTML/CSS, and I need to make that list a rich text, but without making each LI element a rich text. Instead, I need to make the entire UL list a rich text, while keeping the links that are present in the LI elements. Can someone explain to me how to do that?
